It was great to meet Andy and Keith from the @EnvAgencyNW in Padiham earlier today to talk about the much needed flood defences. 
Lots of work is going on now to prepare everything, ready for main work to start next year. And completion is on track for November 2022! https://t.co/Mpy7PNZelX

text: RT @WEETFEvents: Join us on the 4th December to discuss #Flood and #CoastalErosion risk management? Speakers include @EmmaHowardBoyd @EnvAg‚Ä¶

@kingpeterking @MariaHerlihyEA @RomneyWeir @EnvAgencySE @MarkHill03 @wifo_ea @Ang_WaterwaysEA Many parts of the Thames are shallow at the edges and many stretches have overhanging foliage well into the river which makes it hazardous for aft deck and fly bridge boats to get too close.  Rowers can probably get closer in than most powered craft
